casebody.data:
No. 1593,

Misc.

Combs v. LaVallee, Warden. Robert B. Fiske, Jr., for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First x4ssistant Attorney General, and Hillel Hoffman, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
